## Token Catalogue

<!-- BEGIN AUTO-GENERATED: Token Catalogue -->

| Category | Name | Value | Description |
|----------|------|-------|-------------|
| color | primary.100 | #cffafe | Shade 100 |
| color | primary.200 | #a5f3fc | Shade 200 |
| color | primary.300 | #67e8f9 | Shade 300 |
| color | primary.400 | #22d3ee | Shade 400 |
| color | primary.50 | #ecfeff | Shade 50 |
| color | primary.500 | #06b6d4 | Shade 500 |
| color | primary.600 | #0891b2 | Shade 600 |
| color | primary.700 | #0e7490 | Shade 700 |
| color | primary.800 | #155e75 | Shade 800 |
| color | primary.900 | #164e63 | Shade 900 |
| color | primary.dark | #0891b2 | Dark variant |
| color | primary.DEFAULT | #06b6d4 | Primary brand color |
| color | primary.light | #22d3ee | Light variant |

<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED: Token Catalogue -->

## Future Token Sources

Additional tokens will be extracted from the `/frontend/tokens` directory when it is created.
Currently only Tailwind config tokens are generated.
